title: Decision Proposition
description: The  Decision Proposition XDM is used to capture the outcome of a decisioning process

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/decision.title: Decision Proposition ID
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/decision.description: An ID associated with an individual decision response. A single decision can produce an array of propositions, one for each activity involved. It is the expectation that applications reference this ID in every experience event that was influended by the propositions. A user profile's proposition-response history is maintained with these identifiers.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/decision.title: Propopostion Array providing the outcomes of a single decision event, one outcome per given activity
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/decision.description: Details about the individual context variables and outcomes for the decision.
